{"id":915011412,"question_id":42,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1678799780,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/915011412/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"20.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int ans = 0;\n        vector<int> lmax(height.size(), -1), rmax(height.size(), -1);\n        lmax[0] = height[0];\n        for(int i = 1; i < height.size(); i++) lmax[i] = max(lmax[i-1], height[i]);\n        rmax.back() = height.back();\n        for(int i = height.size() - 2; i > -1; i--) rmax[i] = max(rmax[i+1], height[i]);\n        for(int i = 1; i < height.size(); i++){\n           if(lmax[i] <= height[i] || rmax[i] <= height[i]) continue;\n           ans += min(lmax[i], rmax[i]) - height[i];\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
